modules.description: Provides functions to parse and generate XML from and to string values, simplifying common tasks like reading and writing XML content. Works with basic data types such as strings and lists, and handles XML elements and attributes through a streamlined interface. Ideal for scripting scenarios where rapid XML manipulation is needed without the complexity of lower-level XML processing.

The module provides XML parsing and generation capabilities, focusing on extracting, filtering, and transforming XML nodes and DTDs through high-level input/output functions for strings and channels. It operates on XML nodes and DTD values, enabling tag-based manipulation and iteration over structured data. This is particularly useful for scripting tasks requiring straightforward XML processing without complex signal handling.
